      • landOnSquare

        private static void landOnSquare(Square currentSquare,
                                 Player currentPlayer,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Square> squares)
        Actions that occur when landing on a square depending on the current square details and player balance.

        Includes:
        - paying fines;
        - removing a player if the fine causes them to drop below 0;
        - square purchase validation checks.
        Parameters:
        currentSquare - the square that has been landed upon.
        currentPlayer - the player taking their turn.
        players - the players still in the game.
        squares - the board squares.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • developSquare

                                  Player currentPlayer)
        Charges the developer the necessary amount of money and updates the square attributes.
        Parameters:
        currentSquare - the square being developed
        currentPlayer - the developer

      • keywordCatcher

        private static void keywordCatcher(java.lang.String currentLine,
                                   Player currentPlayer,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Performs different commands depending on the input of the user at the start of their turn. Validation is performed elsewhere.

        "rules": displays the rules;
        "save": saves the game
        "exit": exits the game
        Parameters:
        currentLine - the user inputted command.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
